Title: Perhaps, Perhaps, Perhaps
Plot: Sally is terrified that she might be pregnant, so she takes a pregnancy test and asks the other girls to do the same so that she knows what a negative result looks like. In her fluster she gets the tests muddled up. One of the girls is pregnant, but which one?
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Lloyd Owen, Thea Rowland, Seun Shote
